title: SOLD Walter Johnson PC796 Sepia Postcard SGC 2.5
author: BLongley

posts.post_title: SOLD Walter Johnson PC796 Sepia Postcard SGC 2.5
posts.post_content: SOLD dlvd PayPal f/f, if you want to use PayPal goods then pls add 3% to purchase price. Please PM with any questions. The image presents quite nicely on the front and it is not postally used. There is a stain you can clearly see on the back but it does not show through to the front... corners are rounded but no creases... not bad for a 100+ year old postcard!
Listening to reasonable offers, would like to get this sold.
